text: Læa xạllxḥˌ thrng yk xuthāh̄rṇ̒ kæ̀ brrdā p̄hū̂ ṣ̄rạthṭhā t̄hụng p̣hriyā k̄hxng k̄hxng fir xeā nˌ meụ̄̀x nāng dị̂ kl̀āw ẁā k̄ĥā tæ̀ phracêā k̄hxng k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ k̄hx phraxngkh̒ thrng pord s̄r̂āng b̂ān h̄lạng h̄nụ̀ng h̄ı̂ kæ̀ k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ ṇ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ th̀ān nı s̄wn s̄wrrkh̒ læa thrng pord ch̀wy k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ h̄ı̂ pĥn cāk fir xeā nˌ læa kārk ra thả k̄hxng k̄heā læa thrng pord ch̀wy k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ h̄ı̂ pĥn cāk h̄mū̀ chn p̄hū̂ xṭhrrm
